Name: Lost Amulets: Mystic Land
About the game: Lost Amulets: Mystic Land is a unique combination of hidden object fun, tile-matching puzzles and challenging mini-games. The magical amulets held the five natural elements in balance. Restore harmony with nature by finding the lost amulets. Along your journey reveal the magic spells and collect power-up pearls. Includes two ways to play: Mystic Land & Zen Mahjong solitaire. Challenging mini-games Immersive music 6 Gorgeous tile sets
